hero.subtitle: Expert guidance for university admissions, exam preparation, and career counseling tailored to your goals.

services.title: Our Core Services
services.description: Comprehensive support for every step of your academic and professional journey.

items.title: University Admissions
items.description: Get into your dream school with personalized application strategy, essay editing, and interview prep.

items.title: Exam Preparation
items.description: Master the SAT, GRE, and GMAT with top-tier tutors, custom study plans, and regular mock tests.

items.title: Career Counseling
items.description: Find the right path with professional aptitude assessments, industry insights, and career mapping.

whyChooseUs.title: Personalized Guidance for Proven Results
whyChooseUs.description: We believe every student has a unique potential. Our approach is not one-size-fits-all; we tailor our strategies to fit your personal strengths and aspirations.

features.title: Expert Mentors
features.description: Our team consists of alumni from Ivy League and top-tier universities.

features.title: Data-Driven Strategy
features.description: We use historical admission data to maximize your acceptance chances.

features.title: End-to-End Support
features.description: From profile building to visa counseling, we are with you throughout.

items.name: Sarah Jenkins
items.subtitle: Accepted to Harvard
items.quote: RightPath Saarthi helped me get into my dream university! The essay editing service was a game changer for my application.

items.name: Michael Tran
items.subtitle: GRE Score: 330
items.quote: The exam prep tutors were incredibly knowledgeable. They helped me improve my score by over 20 points in just two months.

items.name: Emily Rodriguez
items.subtitle: Career Transition
items.quote: I finally found a career path that fits my skills. The aptitude assessment was spot on and very detailed.

founders.title: What Our Founders Say
founders.description: Insights and inspiration from the leaders guiding RightPath Saarthi's mission.

items.name: Dr. Sarah Mitchell
items.quote: Education has the power to transform lives. Our goal is to make expert guidance accessible to every aspiring student, bridging the gap between talent and opportunity.
items.subQuote: We founded RightPath Saarthi to bring transparency and personalization to the admissions process. Seeing our students thrive at their dream universities is what drives us every single day.

items.name: James Anderson
items.quote: True mentorship goes beyond simple advice. It's about empowering students to discover their authentic selves and pursue paths that truly resonate with their ambitions.
items.subQuote: At RightPath Saarthi, we don't just prepare you for exams; we prepare you for life's challenges. Our holistic approach ensures you are ready for whatever the future holds.

enquiryForm.title: Begin Your Academic Success Story
enquiryForm.description: Share a few details and we'll craft a personalized path for your goals.

cta.title: Ready to Take the Next Step?
cta.description: Join thousands of students who have achieved their academic and career goals with RightPath Saarthi.
